Google has just announced in conjunction with its 29% rise in fourth-quarter profit, that co-founder Larry Page will assume the role of chief executive officer( CEO) from early April onwards, while co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his energy to strategic projects. As for current CEO Eric Schmidt , he will end up as the executive chairman.
